alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Crawford; Monroe; Peach; Talbot; Taylor; Upson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 12:58PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Bibb, southwestern Monroe, Upson, central Peach, Crawford, eastern Talbot and northern Taylor Counties through 145 PM EDT... At 1258 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Salem, or 7 miles northwest of Roberta, moving northwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Fort Valley, Thomaston, Butler, Roberta, Reynolds, Yatesville, Junction City, Culloden, Lincoln Park, The Rock, Nakomis, Russellville, Howard, Logtown, Salem, Prattsburg, Horns, Big Lazer Creek Wma, Wesley Church and Fickling Mill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for central and west central Georgia.

area.areaDesc: Bibb; Crawford; Monroe; Peach; Talbot; Taylor; Upson
